line_1: Lest thou affront the awful Deities;
line_2: Observe a careful distance from the Skyes,

line_1: A humbler crowd of nameless deities;
line_2: And ye the common people of these skies,
You'll rather find such sparks as these

line_1: Subdued for thee the potent deities

line_2: This Day we make a Sacrifice
